= Introduction =

The script requires [http://code.google.com/p/pygeoip/ pygeoip] python module to work properly. It also requires [http://www.maxmind.com/app/geolitecountry GeoIP country] [http://geolite.maxmind.com/download/geoip/database/GeoLiteCountry/GeoIP.dat.gz database].
